editorialSummary.text: Compact boutique clothing store offering a bohemian-inspired collection for women & children.

originalText.text: My granddaughters flip for this place. It‚Äôs happy, colorful, super great collection of clothing. Staff extremely nice & patient.  We love coming to shop here! Fun Accessories as well

text.text: My granddaughters flip for this place. It‚Äôs happy, colorful, super great collection of clothing. Staff extremely nice & patient.  We love coming to shop here! Fun Accessories as well

originalText.text: This is the cutest kids boutique on the UES.  I don't have kids but I'm the auntie of way too many so I love shopping at unique and cute kids shops.  This boutique has a little of everything and an amazing selection that feels super handpicked.  The clothes is absolutely adorable, the toys are the cutest and the selection of other gift-able items are great.  I love their books and small gifts which is what I typically go in for. I think no one walks out of here empty handed it's such a great shop.

originalText.text:
Great Customer Service

In the past I had the pleasure of shopping at Pink Chicken, Charleston several times. I live in Palm Beach now and am not able to travel to SC to shop as much as I would like. Recently, I saw some items online that I wanted to purchase but had some questions pertaining to fit and fabric.

I called the Charleston store and was helped right away with my concerns. Not only did the staff assist me with questions they also took the time to lay out outfits, photograph and text them to me so that I could preview what I was purchasing. I ended up with six fabulous outfits as well as some items they had on sale that I didn‚Äôt see on the website. I received my purchase well packaged and as expected.

Days later the store manager Rebecca called me to make sure I receive the items and that they fit my son as expected. In this day of the big box store shopping and Amazon it‚Äôs fabulous to have a local boutique that is able to ship out of state and offer a boutique shopping experience over the phone. Customer service is why I have and will continue to shop at this boutique. Job well done Rebeccaüëåüèª, you and your staff are wonderful.

Happy Mom from Palm Beach, Fl

originalText.text: If only my daughter wore dresses! They shine with fun and colorful dresses. Filled with pattern and charm. Lovely interesting clothing for kids. I wish they made blouses for girls. They also sell clothing for women and boys.
